–í–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è: Senior DevOps Engineer 
–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: CeTu
–í–∏–ª–∫–∞ –ó–ü: $6k - $7k
–£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è: full-time, remote,  contractor 
–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã: @TatianaGoro 

As a DevOps engineer at CeTu you will lead the definition and development of our deployment flows and production management.
You will be required to design deployment flows that can handle various requirements such as: multi tenancy, multi cloud, k8s, vm based and more.

We are looking for an engineer with past experience as a backend developer.

Requirements:
* Excellent interpersonal skills, good team player.
* Fluent English - must!
* BSc Computer science or equivalent.
* 3+ years experience as a backend software engineer (Python)
* 3+ years experience in similar positions
* Managed production environment with k8s
* Hands-on experience with cloud providers (AWS/GCP/Azure)
* Hands-on experience with infrastructure-as-code solutions such as TerraForm.
* Operating observability / monitoring of 50+ nodes environment.

Bonus qualifications / experience:
* ArgoCD deployments
* AWS certifications
* Managing large scale MongoDB
* Experience scaling Prometheus / Thanos
* Experience with ClickHouse for managing metrics
* OpenTelemetry tooling
